PML 2016

Schedule of activities

Sunday July 24

  • 19:00: Tapas meet-up in Barcelona (for those that are there)
  • 19:00: Tapas meet-up in Santa Coloma (for those that are there)

Monday July 25

  • 10:30 - 11:30: at la Estrella for breakfast (reserve)
  • 11:30 - 12:30: Walking tour of SCQ with Jaume
  • 12:30 - 13:30: Market in town square and groceries
  • 13:30 - 15:30: "Vermut" and sandwiches in town square
  • 15:30 - 16:30: Walk/drive back to Guialmons
  • 20:00: Gainesville Brews make BBQ dinner

Tuesday July 26

  • 08:00 - 11:00: Hike San Miquel
  • 13:00 - 15:00: Colomi lunch (reserve)
  • 15:00 - 17:00: SCQ pool
  • 20:00: Canada/NYC Brews make dinner

Wednesday July 27

  • 10:00 - 13:00: Paintball at (reserve)
  • 10:00 - 13:00; Karting at (reserve)
  • 14:00 - 16:00: Lunch at beach (reserve)
  • 16:00 - 20:00: Beach
  • 20:00: Traditional Catalan light dinner (reserve)

Thusday July 28

  • 08:00 - 12:00: Montserrat monastery hike
  • 13:00 - 15:00: Lunch at Cal Noio (reserve)
  • 16:00 - 18:00: Cava tour
  • 20:00: Potluck dinner (everyone cooks)

Friday July 29

  • 12:00 - 13:00: Short hike to Figuerola
  • 13:00 - 15:00: Picnic at the hermitage of Figuerola
  • 16:00 - 18:00: SCQ pool
  • 20:00 - 23:00: Tapas in town square
  • 23:00 - 00:00: Concert at SCQ castle (Coloma singing in it)

Saturday July 30

  • Day trip to Girona
